name: incautiously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not give careful thought to the possible results: The cows got into the garden through a gate incautiously left open. This sort of grass will cut your hand if you pull it incautiously. See
incautious
More examplesFewer examplesAn incautiously worded letter could have legal repercussions. He incautiously committed himself to a course of action.When I was ten and my brother eleven, a cousin incautiously gave us a chemistry book. Incautiously, he wrote a disparaging article for the newspaper.
